languages.text: "Темный город выпустил нас из терновых объятий. Раны тела будут залечены, но что насчет ран души?" {n}Ирлиэт касается алого камня, инкрустированного в нагрудник.{/n} "Крударах пал, и с его гибелью на осколки разбились хрупкие жизни миллионов {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детей Азуриана{/g}. Разрозненные по этой части галактики, гонимые {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}, преследуемые Темными, плененные слугами Той, Что Жаждет..."

traits.locale_text: "Темный Город выпустил нас из терновых объятий. Раны тела будут залечены, но что насчет ран души?" {n}Ирлиэт касается алого камня, инкрустированного в нагрудник.{/n} "Крударах пал, и с его гибелью на осколки разбились хрупкие жизни миллионов {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детей Азуриана{/g}. Разрозненные по этой части галактики, гонимые {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}, преследуемые Темными, плененные слугами Той, Что Жаждет..."

languages.text: "The Dark City released us from its thorny embrace. The wounds of the body will heal, but what about the wounds of the soul?" {n}Yrliet's hand brushes against the crimson stone embedded in her chestplate.{/n} "Crudarach fell, and its demise shattered the fragile lives of countless {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. Scattered across this part of the galaxy, hounded by the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, pursued by the dark cousins, imprisoned by the servants of She Who Thirsts..."

Scattered across this part of the galaxy, hounded by the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, pursued by the Dark Ones, imprisoned by the servants of She Who Thirsts..."

languages.text: “黑暗之城已经将我们从它荆棘密布的怀抱中释放出来。肉体的伤痕会愈合，但灵魂的伤痕呢？”{n}伊莉耶特的手拂过嵌在她胸甲上的深红色石头。{/n}“克鲁达拉赫已经陷落，它的消亡带走了无数{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}脆弱的生命。他们散落这片银河系中，被{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}追捕，被我那些黑暗的表亲猎杀，被饥渴女士的仆从囚禁……”
languages.original_text: "The Dark City released us from its thorny embrace. The wounds of the body will heal, but what about the wounds of the soul?" {n}Yrliet's hand brushes against the crimson stone embedded in her chestplate.{/n} "Crudarach fell, and its demise shattered the fragile lives of countless {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. Scattered across this part of the galaxy, hounded by the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, pursued by the dark cousins, imprisoned by the servants of She Who Thirsts..."

traits.locale_text: “黑暗之城已经将我们从它荆棘密布的怀抱中释放出来。肉体的伤痕会愈合，但灵魂的伤痕呢？”{n}伊莉耶特的手拂过嵌在她胸甲上的深红色石头。{/n}“克鲁达拉赫已经陷落，它的消亡带走了无数{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}脆弱的生命。他们散落这片银河系中，被{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}追捕，被我那些黑暗的表亲猎杀，被饥渴女士的仆从囚禁……”
“黑暗之城已经将我们从它荆棘密布的怀抱中释放出来。肉体的伤痕会愈合，但灵魂的伤痕呢？”{n}伊莉耶特的手拂过嵌在她胸甲上的深红色石头。{/n}“克鲁达拉赫已经陷落，它的消亡带走了无数{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}脆弱的生命。他们散落这片银河系中，被{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}追捕，被黑暗之民猎杀，被饥渴女士的仆从囚禁……”

languages.original_text: "The Dark City released us from its thorny embrace. The wounds of the body will heal, but what about the wounds of the soul?" {n}Yrliet's hand brushes against the crimson stone embedded in her chestplate.{/n} "Crudarach fell, and its demise shattered the fragile lives of countless Children of Asuryan. Scattered across this part of the galaxy, hounded by the mon-keigh, pursued by the Dark Ones, imprisoned by the servants of She Who Thirsts..."

languages.text: «La Ciudad Siniestra nos ha liberado de su punzante abrazo. Las heridas del cuerpo curarán, pero ¿qué hay de las del alma?». {n}La mano de Yrliet roza la piedra carmesí engastada en su coraza.{/n} «Crudarach cayó y su fin destrozó las frágiles vidas de innumerables {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g}. Esparcidos por este rincón de la galaxia, perseguidos por los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, perseguidos por nuestros primos oscuros, atrapados por los siervos de la Sedienta...».
languages.original_text: "The Dark City released us from its thorny embrace. The wounds of the body will heal, but what about the wounds of the soul?" {n}Yrliet's hand brushes against the crimson stone embedded in her chestplate.{/n} "Crudarach fell, and its demise shattered the fragile lives of countless {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. Scattered across this part of the galaxy, hounded by the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, pursued by the dark cousins, imprisoned by the servants of She Who Thirsts..."

traits.locale_text: «La Ciudad Siniestra nos ha liberado de su punzante abrazo. Las heridas del cuerpo curarán, pero ¿qué hay de las del alma?». {n}La mano de Yrliet roza la piedra carmesí engastada en su coraza.{/n} «Crudarach cayó y su fin destrozó las frágiles vidas de innumerables {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g}. Esparcidos por este rincón de la galaxia, perseguidos por los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, perseguidos por nuestros primos oscuros, atrapados por los siervos de la Sedienta...».

languages.text: 「仄暗き都は我らを茨の抱擁から解放してくれた。肉体の傷は癒えるだろうが、魂の傷はどうだ？」{n}ユリエットの手が、胸当てに埋め込まれた真紅の石に触れる。{/n}「クルダラは滅び、無数の{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}の儚い命を砕いた。銀河のこの一帯に散らばり、{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}に追い回され、闇のいとこに追われ、かの渇きたる女のしもべに閉じ込められたのだ…」
languages.original_text: "The Dark City released us from its thorny embrace. The wounds of the body will heal, but what about the wounds of the soul?" {n}Yrliet's hand brushes against the crimson stone embedded in her chestplate.{/n} "Crudarach fell, and its demise shattered the fragile lives of countless {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. Scattered across this part of the galaxy, hounded by the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, pursued by the dark cousins, imprisoned by the servants of She Who Thirsts..."

traits.locale_text: 「仄暗き都は我らを茨の抱擁から解放してくれた。肉体の傷は癒えるだろうが、魂の傷はどうだ？」{n}ユリエットの手が、胸当てに埋め込まれた真紅の石に触れる。{/n}「クルダラは滅び、無数の{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}の儚い命を砕いた。銀河のこの一帯に散らばり、{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}に追い回され、闇のいとこに追われ、かの渇きたる女のしもべに閉じ込められたのだ…」

「仄暗き都は私たちを茨の抱擁から解放してくれた。肉体の傷は癒えるだろうが、魂の傷はどうだろう？」{n}ユリエットの手が、胸当てに埋め込まれた真紅の石に触れる。{/n}「クルダラは滅び、無数の{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}の儚い命を砕いた。銀河のこの一帯に散らばり、{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}に追い回され、闇の者に追われ、〈かの渇きたる女〉のしもべに閉じ込められたのだ…」

languages.text: "Die Dunkle Stadt hat uns aus ihrer dornigen Umarmung entlassen. Die Wunden des Körpers werden verheilen, doch was ist mit den Wunden der Seele?" {n}Yrliets Hand streift über den roten Stein, der in ihre Brustplatte eingelassen ist.{/n} "Crudarach ist gefallen, was die zerbrechlichen Leben unzähliger {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kinder von Asuryan{/g} zertrümmert hat. In diesem gesamten Teil der Galaxie verstreut, von den {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} gehetzt, von den dunklen Vettern gejagt, von Ihr, die dürstet, und ihren Dienern eingesperrt ..."
languages.original_text: "The Dark City released us from its thorny embrace. The wounds of the body will heal, but what about the wounds of the soul?" {n}Yrliet's hand brushes against the crimson stone embedded in her chestplate.{/n} "Crudarach fell, and its demise shattered the fragile lives of countless {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. Scattered across this part of the galaxy, hounded by the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, pursued by the dark cousins, imprisoned by the servants of She Who Thirsts..."

traits.locale_text: "Die Dunkle Stadt hat uns aus ihrer dornigen Umarmung entlassen. Die Wunden des Körpers werden verheilen, doch was ist mit den Wunden der Seele?" {n}Yrliets Hand streift über den roten Stein, der in ihre Brustplatte eingelassen ist.{/n} "Crudarach ist gefallen, was die zerbrechlichen Leben unzähliger {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kinder von Asuryan{/g} zertrümmert hat. In diesem gesamten Teil der Galaxie verstreut, von den {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} gehetzt, von den Dunklen gejagt, von Ihr, die dürstet, und ihren Dienern eingesperrt ..."

"Die Dunkle Stadt hat uns aus ihrer dornigen Umarmung entlassen. Die Wunden des Körpers werden verheilen, doch was ist mit den Wunden der Seele?" {n}Yrliets Hand streift über den roten Stein, der in ihre Brustplatte eingelassen ist.{/n} "Crudarach ist gefallen, was die zerbrechlichen Leben unzähliger {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kinder von Asuryan{/g} zertrümmert hat. In diesem gesamten Teil der Galaxie verstreut, von den {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} gehetzt, von den Dunklen gejagt, von Ihr, die dürstet, und ihren Dienern eingesperrt ..."

languages.text: « La Cité Crépusculaire nous a {mf|libérés|libérées} de son étreinte épineuse. Nos blessures physiques guériront, mais qu'en est-il de celles qui ont touché notre âme ? » {n}Yrliet passe sa main sur la pierre écarlate incrustée dans son plastron.{/n} « Crudarach est tombé et sa destruction a bouleversé les vies fragiles d'innombrables {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g}. Dispersés dans ce secteur de la galaxie, chassés par les {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, poursuivis par les Drukharis, emprisonnés par les serviteurs de l'Assoiffée... »
languages.original_text: "The Dark City released us from its thorny embrace. The wounds of the body will heal, but what about the wounds of the soul?" {n}Yrliet's hand brushes against the crimson stone embedded in her chestplate.{/n} "Crudarach fell, and its demise shattered the fragile lives of countless {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. Scattered across this part of the galaxy, hounded by the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, pursued by the dark cousins, imprisoned by the servants of She Who Thirsts..."

traits.locale_text: « La Cité Crépusculaire nous a {mf|libérés|libérées} de son étreinte épineuse. Nos blessures physiques guériront, mais qu'en est-il de celles qui ont touché notre âme ? » {n}Yrliet passe sa main sur la pierre écarlate incrustée dans son plastron.{/n} « Crudarach est tombé et sa destruction a bouleversé les vies fragiles d'innombrables {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g}. Dispersés dans ce secteur de la galaxie, chassés par les {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, poursuivis par les Drukharis, emprisonnés par les serviteurs de l'Assoiffée... »

languages.text: "Kara Şehir bizi dikenli kavrayışından azat etti. Bedende açılan yaralar elbet iyileşir. Ya ruhta açılanlar?" {n}Yrliet, elini göğüs zırhına gömülü kızıl taşta gezdiriyor.{/n} "Crudarach yıkıldı. Yok oluşuysa nice {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocuğu'nun{/g} zaten pamuk ipliğine bağlı hayatını paramparça etti. Galaksinin bu kısmında dört bir yana dağıldılar, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keighler{/g} av misali izlerini sürdü, kara soydaşlar bir an bile peşlerini bırakmadı, Susayan'ın hizmetkârları tarafından hapsedildiler."
languages.original_text: "The Dark City released us from its thorny embrace. The wounds of the body will heal, but what about the wounds of the soul?" {n}Yrliet's hand brushes against the crimson stone embedded in her chestplate.{/n} "Crudarach fell, and its demise shattered the fragile lives of countless {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}. Scattered across this part of the galaxy, hounded by the {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, pursued by the dark cousins, imprisoned by the servants of She Who Thirsts..."

traits.locale_text: "Kara Şehir, bizi dikenli kuşatmasından azat etti. Bedende açılan yaralar elbette iyileşir. Peki ya ruhta açılan yaralar ne olacak?" {n}Yrliet, elini göğüs zırhına gömülü kızıl kristalde gezdiriyor.{/n} "Crudarach yıkıldı. Yok oluşuysa nice {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocuğu{/g}nun hâlihazırda kırılgan hayatını paramparça etti. Galaksinin bu kısmında dört bir yana dağıldılar, {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}ler av misali izlerini sürdü, Karalar bir an bile peşlerini bırakmadı, Susayan'ın hizmetkârları tarafından hapsedildiler..."
